general.name: DRMM Log Grabber [WIN]
general.description: Grabs logs (or any files), zips them and outputs them into a directory of your choice. Both files and folders are accepted.

variable.name: log_grabber_files
variable.description: files and folders to zip, separated by semicolons

variable.name: log_grabber_output_dir
variable.description: Directory to output the zipfile to

variable.name: dump_env_vars
variable.description: Dump all env vars to stdout. Useful for debuggung,
